EmailTemplate.subject: Run a Shell Station? You’ll Want to See This
EmailTemplate.textOnly: If you’re like many Shell operators, you’re constantly looking for smarter ways to run your c-store. You want to see faster returns on the money you’ve invested. And you want to make your job easier. NCR can help, with three solutions that are certified for Shell: NCR RPOS. 45% of c-store shoppers are in and out in 3 minutes. Your store needs a completely connected platform that speeds up everything. See how to gain agility with RPOS. <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/convenience-fuel-retail/shell?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2021_March_MajorOilShellCampaign_Retail&utm_content=Email1&utm_industry=retail&utm_sub-industry=Convenience_&_Fuel#rpos]]> NCR Foodservice. Why? Foodservice sales grew at double the rate of c-store revenues last year. But you can help create an experience that rivals quick-service restaurants—while streamlining your operation. Take a look at this brochure <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/convenience-fuel-retail/shell?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2021_March_MajorOilShellCampaign_Retail&utm_content=Email1&utm_industry=retail&utm_sub-industry=Convenience_&_Fuel#foodservice_brochure]]>. NCR Self-Checkout. Again, COVID is driving serious shopper changes: a full 75% plan to use convenience store self-checkouts now. But only NCR offers one key feature that all c-stores need. See it here <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/convenience-fuel-retail/shell?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2021_March_MajorOilShellCampaign_Retail&utm_content=Email1&utm_industry=retail&utm_sub-industry=Convenience_&_Fuel#self_checkout]]>. Give your customers the speedy, convenient experience they expect while meeting their changing demands—all with one certified Shell partner: NCR.
